# Second session

![][13]![][14]

 _DApps Dev Club's second session_

DApps Dev Club will be holding its second session, **Technical
overview** , on Tuesday.

The topics that we will be covering: The Ethereum Virtual Machine, Smart
Contracts, and Web3.

## Format

As promised in the [kickoff session][15], future sessions will be less
of us talking/ presenting - and transition towards a more discussion and
hands on type session.

In this session, we will not be delving into the code yet. But we will
get our first glimpse of Solidity!

Read select parts of the [_Mastering Ethereum_][16] book, which we'll be
discussing in the next session:

  * Chapter 1: What is Ethereum

    * Optional: _Ethereum a€™s Four Stages of Development_
    * Optional: _The Birth of Ethereum_
    * Optional: _Ethereum a€™s Development Culture_
    * Read all of the sections in this chapter, except for these ones above, as we do not plan to discuss them in the next session.
    * If you only have time to read _one_ section, read: _Ethereum and Turing Completeness_
  * Chapter 13: The Ethereum Virtual Machine

    * Optional: Compiling Solidity to EVM Bytecode
    * Optional: Contract Deployment Code
    * Optional: Disassembling the Bytecode
    * Read all of the sections in this chapter, except for these ones above, as we do not plan to discuss them in the next session.
    * If you only have time to read _one_ section, read: _Turing Completeness and Gas_

If you don't have time to read any of this at all, don't worry, you can
still come along. You will get more out of it if you do though!

## Venue

[Chainstack][17] is hosting this session, as well as the remaining even-
numbered sessions. You can read more about [our partnership with
Chainstack here][18].

Their offices are at Suntec City, Tower 3, Level 30, Acronis.

How to get there:

  * By train: ðŸš† Promenade MRT (DT15/CC4) -> Exit C -> enter Tower 2 -> walk across to Tower 3
  * Otherwise: ðŸ--º [Location on map][19]

Please bring along a photo ID for building security to let you in. When
you are at exit the lift, follow the _DADC_ signs to enter.

## RSVP

Please let us know that you are planning to attend. This helps us as
organisers plan the seating arrangements, and a handful of other things
too.

[RSVP on eventbrite][20]
